| OBJECTIVE 7-4 | Discuss how companies differentiate and position their products for maximum competitive advantage.  
| --- | --- |  
|  | *Differentiation and Positioning* (pp 228â€“236) |
summary_markdown: This content outlines Objective 7-4, focusing on how companies achieve competitive advantage through product differentiation and positioning. The objective encompasses a discussion of strategies and tactics employed by businesses to distinguish their offerings in the marketplace and establish a distinct place in the minds of target consumers. This involves understanding the core concepts of differentiation, which relates to making a product unique and superior to competitors, and positioning, which concerns how that unique value proposition is communicated and perceived. The scope of this objective, as indicated by the page references, suggests a detailed exploration of the theoretical frameworks and practical applications of these marketing principles.
